body.p:
35
Sept. 19" 3.
Dr. Richd. Walker
Flemingsburg Ky
Sir
Yours of the 12th instant to the Governor has been referred to me for answer.
There are no vacancies for Assistant Surgeons in the Ky Regiments at present should any vacancy occur to which you can be appointed, it would afford me pleasure to give you a Commission.

Yours respy
John Boyle
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
by Chas Haydon
Clerk
